mapper.select: select id as id, house_id as houseId, name as name, rented_status as rentedStatus, rent_people_name as rentPeopleName, rent_people_phone_number as rentPeoplePhoneNumber, payor_type as payorType, contract_start_time as contractStartTime, contract_end_time as contractEndTime, creator_name as creatorName, updator_name as updatorName, update_time as updateTime, is_deleted as isDeleted from room_info WHERE 1 = 1
